820500.name: Tisnart Shapes
820500.description:
Tisnart Shapes delivers an exciting unique take on the familiar match game genre.

There are many challenges for you to conquer, twists and turns that await you on each new level. Dice Blockers, Rivet shields, Rotators, Shape Shifters and more will be there to surprise you just when you think you know what to expect.

There is even much more to discover! Interesting new Power-Ups like the Shape Magnet, Clonning Grabber or Double Slider to name a few.
Use your solving skills in 90 different puzzle levels or try completing all 72 achievements and more.......Ready for something new?
820500.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
